home.hero.title: Lunch Delivered Your way Just A Click Away
home.hero.content: With our daily meal box and  corporate catering program, you and your team can enjoy healthy, delicious lunches at the office every day. We deliver directly from our kitchens to your workplace — on time, hassle-free, and at a great price.
home.hero.title2: Get into the Holiday Spirit-Enjoy 20% off all Orders Next week!!!
home.hero.title3: Get a 50% discount for each friend you refer.
home.hero.content3: Get special perks for you and your Colleagues, friends and Work family.
home.section0.caption: About Mittag Dabbas
home.section0.title: Warm meals and great deals
home.section0.content1: At Mittag-Dabbas, we know that a delicious lunch isn’t just a break; it’s the key to fueling productivity and creativity. Get a serotonin kick whether you’re a fan of wholesome vegetarian dishes, hearty high-protein meals, or anything in between, we’ve got something for you no matter which planet you’re from.
home.section0.content2: Inspired by the legendary dabbawalas of Mumbai—a network renowned for its flawless lunchbox deliveries—Mittag-Dabbas brings this iconic tradition to the contemporary food culture streets of Berlin. Powered by the culinary expertise of Tandoori Nächte, we’ve reimagined the humble dabba for the modern workplace.
home.section1.caption: Why Mittag Dabbas
home.section1.title: Where the flavour inebriates you
home.section1.content1: Explore a curated selection of top local vendors, all hand-picked for quality.
home.section1.content2: We bring you the best food from the best restaurants straight to your office.
home.section1.content3: Enjoy seamless office food delivery powered by cutting-edge technology.
home.section2.caption: Daily Office Meal
home.section2.title: LUNCH TIME? YOU CAN DEPEND ON US! Boost your team's creativity, productivity, and wellness.
home.section2.content1: Bringing your team together with a referral program getting 50% off.
home.section2.content2: Dynamic menus, daily and monthly offers, referral programs and culinary preferred meals are all taken care.
home.section2.content3: Dependable deliveries, quality check and excellent customer service.
home.section3.caption: Corporate Catering
home.section3.title: Corporate catering that excels in every aspect of events, meetings, and special occasions.
home.section3.content1: Partnership program to take the charge for all your company lunch meals, your requirement is our priority.
home.section3.content2: From team meetings to large-scale corporate events, we craft personalized menus that cater to your team’s tastes and dietary preferences.
home.section3.content3: For every special occasion we have something special for you! Give the headache of the lunch organization a break and we’ll take care of it.
home.section4.caption: Our Menu
home.section4.title: Diverse Selections for Every Palate
home.section4.content1: Indulge in our thoughtfully curated meals, each crafted to provide a satisfying lunch experience for one. Our diverse menu ensures that there’s a dish to please every palate, from savory to refreshing. All meals are fully prepared and ready to enjoy—no cooking required.
home.section4.content2: Indulge in our thoughtfully curated meals, each crafted to provide a satisfying lunch experience for one.
home.testimonials.caption: Testimonials
home.testimonials.title: Transforming Feedback into Excellence
home.call.to.action.title: Are you ready to embark on this journey?

daily.office.meal.hero.title: Daily Office Meal
daily.office.meal.section1.caption: Daily Deliveries
daily.office.meal.section1.title: Exquisite office catering in Germany, delivered punctually and customized to your preferences.
daily.office.meal.section1.content1: Don’t let hangry employees dampen the office atmosphere! Mittag-Dabbas corporate catering platform is your go-to solution for convenient, high-quality meals that energize both body and mind. Whether it’s a special occasion or daily dining, we cater to all dietary requirements, ensuring your team stays happy and productive. With us, you’ll have everything you need for corporate catering in one place.
daily.office.meal.flow.caption: How it works
daily.office.meal.flow.title: From Desk to Dining – Enjoy Balanced, Nutritious Meals at Work
daily.office.meal.flow.step1.title: Start by signing up for your daily mealbox.
daily.office.meal.flow.step1.description: Savor the joy of taste-tested restaurant meals brought straight to your office. Just sign up yourself and your team for daily mealboxes.
daily.office.meal.flow.step2.title: Order your choice of Mealbox.
daily.office.meal.flow.step2.description: Log in to discover your personalized daily office meal menus designed for your nutritional goals. Enjoy hassle-free meal ordering up to seven days in advance.
daily.office.meal.flow.step3.title: Delivered to your Desk & Savor the Magic.
daily.office.meal.flow.step3.description: From our kitchen to your Desk, we guarantee timely and delicious meals that bring your team together. Good food creates great connections.
daily.office.meal.flow.step4.title: Streamlined Meal Solutions.
daily.office.meal.flow.step4.description: Streamline your corporate and university meal management with our user-friendly technology. Effortlessly choose, manage, and preorders, all while enjoying transparent, pay-as-you-eat invoices. Sit back, relax, we will make it easy for you.
corporate.catering.hero.title: Corporate Catering
corporate.catering.section1.caption: Fresh Meals, Zero Stress
corporate.catering.section1.title: Exquisite office catering in Germany, delivered punctually and keeping in mind all culinary preferences.
corporate.catering.section1.content1: We provide fresh, chef-prepared meals delivered right to your desk. Whether you’re looking for healthy, delicious meals for a busy lifestyle or simply want to take the guesswork out of meal planning, our meal boxes are crafted to meet your dietary needs. No more grocery shopping or cooking stress—just fresh, tasty, and nutritious meals made with passion!
corporate.catering.flow.caption: How it works
corporate.catering.flow.title: Taste the Ease: Corporate Catering Tailored for Any Celebration
corporate.catering.flow.step1.title: Join us! Sign up for free.
corporate.catering.flow.step1.descriptio: Elevate your corporate catering experience with Mittag Dabbas—where ordering is just a few clicks away. Choose from our daily mealboxes or get curated catering menu.
corporate.catering.flow.step2.title: Choose from the Menu.
corporate.catering.flow.step2.descriptio: Satisfy every palate with our curated selection of top-tier caterers in Germany, offering diverse cuisines to accommodate all dietary needs.
corporate.catering.flow.step3.title: Want something more? Contact Us!
corporate.catering.flow.step3.descriptio: Have something specific in mind contact us today by email, website or just give us a call! We will be happy to serve you the best way possible.
corporate.catering.flow.step4.title: Leave us feedback.
corporate.catering.flow.step4.descriptio: While we cater to all your needs, please feel free to express yourself and your corporation. We always welcome new ideas and taste. Let’s talk!.
menu.hero.title: Our Menu
menu.caption: Our Daily Office Mealboxes
menu.title: Taste the Convenience: Delicious Meals Delivered Daily
menu.feature.caption: Our Corporate Catering Meal
menu.feature.title: Savor Every Moment: Catering Crafted for Your Corporate Needs.
menu.feature.content1: At Your Companies, we understand that every corporate event is unique, and so are the catering needs that accompany them. Whether you're hosting a small team meeting, a grand corporate celebration, or anything in between, we offer a diverse range of meal options tailored to satisfy every palate.
menu.feature.content2: Ready to elevate your next corporate event? Contact us today to inquire about our catering services and discover how we can help make your gathering a memorable one. For further details on menu options, pricing, and availability, please reach out to us at +49-176 32473037.

subscription.model.flow.title: Taste the Ease: Corporate Catering Tailored for Any Celebration
subscription.model.flow.step1.title: Choose Your Plan
subscription.model.flow.step1.descriptio: Select a subscription that fits your lifestyle and dietary preferences.
subscription.model.flow.step2.title: Customize Your Menu
subscription.model.flow.step2.descriptio: Pick meals from our rotating menu or let us choose for you based on your tastes.
subscription.model.flow.step3.title: We Deliver to You

loyalty.program.hero.title: Loyalty Program
loyalty.program.section1.caption: Loyalty Program
loyalty.program.section1.title: Earn points and turn them into rewards
loyalty.program.section1.warning: Please sign in to view your loyalty points.
loyalty.program.section1.content1: For every meal box you order, you'll accumulate points. The more you enjoy our meals, the more points you earn.
loyalty.program.section1.content2: Accumulate points to unlock exclusive rewards, such as discounts on future orders, complimentary meal boxes, or special menu items.
loyalty.program.flow.caption: How it works
loyalty.program.flow.title: Accumulate Points And Redeem Them For Rewards
loyalty.program.flow.step1.title: Sign Up
loyalty.program.flow.step1.description: Become a member today to unlock exclusive benefits through our loyalty program. Enjoy rewards, special offers, and more tailored just for you!
loyalty.program.flow.step2.title: Earn Points
loyalty.program.flow.step2.description: Place a restaurant order - Get 1 Dabba points for every €1 spent
loyalty.program.flow.step2.description1: Sign up to the site - Get 50 Dabba points
